citations.narrative:
As documented in an unexpected outcome report, on February 27, 2025 an alpaca by the name of “Anna” on protocol
2025-5455 was found dead in an approved housing location. As stated in the report, the animal had become entrapped
underneath a gate panel that had been removed for cleaning purposes and leaned against another panel. The
entrapment resulted in the fatality of the animal. When housing facilities are not constructed of such strength as
appropriate for the animals involved, it can result in injury and/or death to the animal within. Housing facilities shall be
maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and to contain the animals.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Critical Repeat
   
Facilities, general. 
As documented in an unexpected outcome report, on February 27, 2025 an alpaca by the name of “Anna” on protocol 
2025-5455 was found dead in an approved housing location. As stated in the report, the animal had become entrapped 
underneath a gate panel that had been removed for cleaning purposes and leaned against another panel. The 
entrapment resulted in the fatality of the animal. When housing facilities are not constructed of such strength as 
appropriate for the animals involved, it can result in injury and/or death to the animal within. Housing facilities shall be 
maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and to contain the animals. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
